scripts.deploy: cd cases && node ../index.js && llvm-dis fib.bc && s2wasm fib.s -o fib-opt.wast -l /Users/micha/.emscripten_cache/wasm/wasm_compiler_rt.a --emscripten-glue --global-base=1024 --initial-memory=16777216 && wasm-as fib-opt.wast -o fib-opt.wasm && cp fib-opt.wasm ../../../webassembly-benchmark/ && cd ..
